name: Luksong Baka
description:
Luksong Baka

Description: Control the farmer to avoid cows and obstacles in a 2D side-scrolling game.

Installation: To play offline and with better performance, download the game from this Google Drive. You may follow the instructions on downloading the game in its Documentation on GitHub.

Read more about the game in its Documentation on GitHub.

Screenshots from the game:

Main Menu JumpingThrowing Bombs Throw Obstacles with Strength Turn Cow into Meat using Dagger
